pudding.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a hot sweet dish, made from cake, rice, bread etc with fruit, milk, or other sweet things added
pudding.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a thick sweet creamy dish, usually made with milk, eggs, sugar, and flour, and served cold
pudding.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a sweet dish served at the end of a meal
pudding.translation[0].definitions[3].de: a hot dish made of a mixture of flour, fat etc, with meat or vegetables inside
